item.title: How I Wrote Twitter in Under a Weekend
item.description: Twitter The Process First, I opened ChatGPT and instructed it with the prompt Write "Twitter". Next, I double clicked ChatGPT’s output to select it, and right clicked to copy it to my clipboard. Next, I opened Neovim and used the command :"+y to paste from my clipboard. Next, I used the command :w to finally write Twitter. A Speech of Gratitude Ladies and gentlemen, esteemed guests, and dear friends, I stand before you today not as myself, but as hgc, the writer of Twitter.
